page.title: 05FARMING - A YORKSHIRE FARMER
page.content: Mr.Crossley lives in Stockton on Forest. He has 400 acres and 26 fields. His sons Paul and Neil go to our school. In Mr. Crossley's fields are grass,winter wheat, winter barley, spring barley,peas, potatoes and oil seed rape. He also has 500 pigs and 50 cows, the cows are used for beef not dairy milking. Two people help on the farm. He has 4 barns for straw and three barns for cattle, two for pigs and one for storing grain. He has 600 big bales of straw and 4000 small bales. Mr.Crossley buys the cheapest fertiliser from I.C.I.He sprays his fields with a tractor or sometimes has Cockerill's helicopter to do the job.
